catalog_info.title: Eugene Onegin
catalog_info.notes: Alternative to Slavic 98b. Tutorial - Junior Year.
catalog_info.description: This course, which is an alternative to Slavic 98b. Tutorial - Junior Year for students who are not concentrators, is devoted to a single topic and provides concentrators with a more intensive reading experience. This year's focus will be devoted to the close reading of "Eugene Onegin" in original.
